__e: It's just that err... my dad ran off with a room service maid.
Once a month, my wife's maid brings her round from 2pm to 5pm.
The day you saw me returning covered with blood, was right after attending a palace servant woman, but I don't remember her name. You must listen to me; I'm telling the truth.
All I know is that she worked at the house as a maid and then she, she got into trouble.
Is this request such a difficult thing to do? Why did your son send the other half of the lottery ticket to his woman instead of to his father?
For me, there were two similar women, one a maid, the other a madame.
